sentences.sentence: But she had no proof of this, and her instinct in the circumstances was to avoid its purlieus.
sentences.translation: 但是她没有这方面的证明，因此在这种情形下，她的本能就是避免接触这个社会。

sentences.sentence: And as he rode through the purlieus of his city, the white mane of his amber-coloured steed was all that he could clearly see in the dusk of the high streets.
sentences.translation: 他骑马穿行在郊外大街上，暮色中只能瞧见他那匹琥珀色骏马的白色鬃毛。
